thread.title: BRIEF-Taiwan's HTC says to reduce operating expenditure by 35 percent and reduce headcount by 15 percent

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Taiwan's HTC says to reduce operating expenditure by 35 percent and reduce headcount by 15 percent
text:
Aug 13 HTC Corp
* Says to reduce operating expenditure by 35 percent and reduce headcount by 15 percent Further company coverage: (Reporting By Michael Gold)
